name: Celestial Stonewall #ld40
description:
FOR BETTER PERFORMANCE PLEASE DOWNLOAD THE WINDOWS VERSION

Celestial Stonewall is an arcade game that take influence from Real Time Tower Defense and the Atari classic Missile Command. All you need is your mouse. Click to build bases, click to shoot rockets from those bases, but be careful... you only have a limited amount of money and those bases are expensive to maintain!

Left Mouse Button controls everything!

Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 40!

Programming/Design: Evan Steitz @EckyYakov

Art: Ryan O'Connell, Mike Marshall

SFX:

Chandler Spradling

Music: 

TFX

SC: https://soundcloud.com/tfx-st

BotB: http://battleofthebits.org/barracks/Profile/tfx/
